descriptions: ['DescriptionBetter Homes proudly presents this originally 4 bedroom penthouse converted into 2 bedroom, fully upgraded apartment on top floor. It comes with a spacious terrace with a private salt water jacuzzi and balcony all around the living room. The living room is extended one. There is one master bedroom and a guest bedroom. Vacant on transfer. The remaining two bedrooms have been removed to give major space to the living room which is currently enjoying 360 views of Dubai Marina. The apartment can still be converted back into a 4 bedroom with ensuites penthouse.Upgrades include, parquet floorings, Italian marble bathrooms, new kitchen, new lighting and air conditioning system. The Penthouse can be sold either furnished or unfurnished. Time Place offers spectacular Marina views and this landmark complex marks a highly sought-after living space that incorporates the world largest and highest sundial into its structure. This high rise building sundial shadow falls across the building,cylindrical shape this allows people to see the time from miles away and from everywhere within the Marina.\xa0 The Marina is a great place to live. A self-contained community with everything you need close at hand, including Dubai Marina Mall, Skydive Dubai, JBR beach, lots of supermarkets, restaurants and the Marina Walk.']

['DescriptionA stunning find in a spectacular project by Meraas. This 1BR is located on a high floor in one of the best buildings in Bluewaters.
Located in Building 7, which is one of the buildings directly framing Ain Dubai, with full, open views of the sea and right on the main retail and F&B area of Bluewaters Island.
Secure a property in Dubai s latest mega-project that is the city island retreat right off JBR. This is a great investment opportunity to purchase exclusive, luxury real estate within a world-class entertainment district. As an end-user, you will own an extremely liquid asset, that will be ready to sell or put up for lease at any time.
What makes Bluewaters Island such a great project to invest in?
It is a federal project that hosts the largest observation in the world! Only 10 residential buildings have been developed on the island, which makes the project very unique, limited and desirable. The low and controlled supply of residences increases the value of your investment here, along with access to 200 retail & dining concepts on the island, the world-famous Caesars Palace and direct pedestrian crossing to JBR.
* Open plan, modern living space
* Floor-to-ceiling windows 
* Bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms
* Fully equipped kitchen with new appliances
* Fine finishing with wooden flooring, soft metallic fixtures, Italian sanitary ware and minimalistic style
